thread.title: Calvin Harris Shares Further Details, Snippets From Migos & Frank Ocean Collab
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris Shares Further Details, Snippets From Migos & Frank Ocean Collab

author: Trevor Smith
title: Calvin Harris Shares Further Details, Snippets From Migos & Frank Ocean Collab
text:
Home > Music > Calvin Harris Shares Further Details, Snippets From Migos & Frank Ocean Collab Calvin Harris Shares Further Details, Snippets From Migos & Frank Ocean Collab 0 0 Posted by Trevor Smith , Feb 21, 2017 at 05:06pm "Slide" is coming soon. 
Kanye West has been advocating for Frank Ocean to be played on the radio, and it seems he may no longer have to complain. Calvin Harris, who has contributed to radio standards like "We Found Love" and "This Is What You Came For" has assembled both Frank and Migos for an upcoming single called "Slide." CALVIN HARRIS // FRANK OCEAN // MIGOS pic.twitter.com/UvsJzm9F6k — Calvin Harris (@CalvinHarris) February 21, 2017 
He's been teasing the song on SnapChat recently , but has now shared some official details on the single, which seems like it will feature both Offset and Quavo (though unfortunately, like "Bad and Boujee," no Takeoff, at least according to the credits). 
He's also continued to preview some snippets from the record, revealing a portion of Quavo's verse. You can watch a 49-second clip of what we've heard so far below. Calvin Harris x Frank x Migos pic.twitter.com/PTZbpjgCSs — Frank Ocean Daily (@TeamFrankDaily) February 21, 2017 
No word on a release date yet, but with this kind of promo, it seems very close.
